div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 16:54 pm EDT

div.div: Clear, with a low around 32. North wind 5 to 10 mph becoming light in the evening.
Increasing clouds, with a high near 54. East wind 5 to 10 mph.
Showers, mainly before 3am. Low around 38. Southeast wind 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

div.p: Thunder Bay Community Health Service, Inc. in partnership with Rogers City Schools, is pleased to announce Dana John Labar is available to provide counseling and therapy services for enrolled students. Mr. Labar is a Licensed Professional Counselor who achieved a Master's degree in counseling from Northern Michigan University. He is a Licensed Professional counselor with over 20 years experience in education. . . .

h3.a: Rogers City High School Office and Principal

div.p: The High School and Middle School office is located in the front of the school where the American Flag waves proudly! Building principal Nicholas Hein looks forward to meeting each and every student who enters into this exciting and transforming period of their life.

div.div: "The Rogers City Area School District, in partnership with parents and the community, is providing a safe learning environment that produces self-sufficient, problem-solving students who are prepared for an ever-changing world."

div.a: This institution is an equal opportunity provider.
